original: 呂蒙以陸遜代位「未有遠名，非羽所忌，無復是過。」陸遜赴任陸口，便書關羽示弱，使關羽調兵專攻樊城。
text: Lu Meng subrogated Lu Xun as "I have no distant name, it is not Yu Yu's taboo, it is nothing more than a mistake." Lu Xun went to Lukou and wrote a letter to Guan Yu to show his weakness, so that Guan Yu transferred his troops to specialize in Fancheng.
